thread.title: Jetty Deepens Executive Bench With New Hires To Lead Growth And Marketing Functions, Real Estate Sales, and Appoints Kevin Dinnie As Senior Advisor

author: cnbc.com
title: Jetty Deepens Executive Bench With New Hires To Lead Growth And Marketing Functions, Real Estate Sales, and Appoints Kevin Dinnie As Senior Advisor
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- J etty , whose products deliver speed, savings, and security for renters and property managers alike, today announced executive hires to support the Company's rapid nationwide growth.
Jetty Co-Founder & CEO Mike Rudoy said, "To support our rapid growth in both consumer demand and property management partnerships, we're thrilled to add three industry leaders with a proven ability to scale organizations. Our new Vice President of Real Estate Sales, Kevin Murphy, will focus on accelerating new partnerships with some of the country's largest property managers and capture interest in our products proven to attract qualified tenants and quickly fill units. There's a tremendous opportunity for Jetty and Kevin will help us seize it." Rudoy continued, "We're also delighted to welcome Kevin Dinnie as Senior Advisor to Jetty. Kevin's decades of managing real estate portfolios for The Blackstone Group, Lehman Brothers, and GE Capital represent an invaluable level of real estate expertise that we're lucky to have on board."
Jetty Co-Founder & President Luke Cohler said, "Given how much of modern renters' income goes to rent, and how much more overall time they spend renting vs. owning—more than any generation to date—they have a real need to determine what products give them the best bang for their buck. Jetty's products and experience meet that need, which has inspired positive word of mouth among consumers and driven growth. To further capture demand and escalate awareness of Jetty we've hired Patrick Briggs, our new Vice President of Growth. Patrick, an accomplished and creative marketing leader, is responsible for our nationwide marketing initiatives and already off to a remarkable start with creative and clever ideas that we're eager to deploy."
PATRICK BRIGGS, Vice President of Growth
Patrick is a seasoned B2C and B2B marketing leader with 12 years experience driving digital revenue growth and creating brand awareness for early-stage to enterprise-stage startups. He previously served as Head of Marketing for Autonomous, a B2B and B2C e-commerce entity; Director of Marketing and Merchandising for eponym, a popular global eyewear licensing platform; and Director of Consumer Marketing and Merchandising for Zazzle. His responsibilities included managing go-to-market strategies resulting in exceeding revenue targets by more than 100% and driving traffic growth 200% YoY. Patrick holds a BA in English Creative Writing from Miami University, where he also minored in Anthropology. He's a big fan of misquoting Quote: s and more recently of sleep (thanks to his newborn, Henry).
KEVIN MURPHY, Vice President of Real Estate Sales
Kevin will be responsible for building Jetty's nationwide real estate team. He possesses more than a decade of real estate sales experience, including nine years at RentPath—most recently as Director of National Accounts, where he facilitated a 50% growth in sales and managed a nationwide team of 10 people. Kevin lives in New Jersey with his wife Tiffany and two-year-old daughter Emily. He holds a Bachelor of Arts Degree with a concentration in Communications from Ursinus College in Collegeville, PA where he served two years as the NCAA Men's Soccer Team Captain.
KEVIN DINNIE, Senior Advisor
Kevin's more than 30 years of global real estate investment and management experience include overseeing investments totaling over $80B in asset value. Currently, Kevin is Founder and Managing Partner of Kingston Hill Partners, a national real estate investment and consulting company. His previous positions include Managing Director at The Blackstone Group's real estate business, where he also served as the Head of Asset Management of the Core Plus investment funds; Managing Director and Global Head of Asset Management at Lehman Brothers Real Estate Partners; and Managing Director with GE Capital Real Estate. Kevin began his career in real estate with Andersen Consulting's Real Estate Consulting Group. He holds a B.A. and MBA in Finance from The University of Connecticut.
ABOUT JETTY
Jetty is a financial services company that designs products and solutions that help people reach their goals faster by removing obstacles and risks. Currently, Jetty focuses on solving the problem of renting a place through a novel offering of financial services and insurance products that reduce headaches for consumers and property managers. Offered in combination or à la carte and accessible over any digital device, Jetty products are widely available across the United States; the Company aims have its offering available fully nationwide within 2018. Ready to Jetty? Visit us at www.jetty.com .
